name: Federation of European Film and TV Directors - Fédération Européenne des Réalisateurs de l'Audiovisuel
goal: Founded in 1980, the Federation of European Film Directors gathers 46 director’s associations as members from 34 countries. It speaks for more than 20,000 European film and TV directors, representing their cultural, creative and economic interests at national and EU level.
interests: Competition, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Single market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: Copyright; Employment policy: Atypical workers in Cultural and Creative Industries; Media policy; EU support to Culture; Trade agreements
